name: Five Keys to Exit
description: A mighty sorcerer cursed your land, you are trapped inside your own home! The terms of the Mighty Sorcerer are simple: 1. Get Five Keys 2. Talk to him 3. Cancel the curse Tips: By playing you will unlock achievements, they are good, very good for you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
